text: Melissa Smith Femling (born November 20, 1970), known professionally as Melissa Disney, is an American voice actress and writer. Her best known role to date was as the voice of the titular character in the Nickelodeon animated series As Told by Ginger and Honey Adams in the Disney Channel animated series North Woods. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Diego County, California Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from California Category:American television actors
title: Melissa Disney
